scripts.pages:deploy: VITE_API_BASE=https://escribe-backend.leembory-equestrian.workers.dev npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy frontend/dist --project-name escribe --branch main
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:worker && npm run pages:deploy
scripts.db:seed:local: npx wrangler d1 execute escribe-dev --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env=local --local --file db/lexicon.sql
scripts.db:seed:dev: npx wrangler d1 execute escribe-dev --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env=dev --file db/lexicon.sql
scripts.db:seed:prod: npx wrangler d1 execute escribe --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env="" --remote --file db/lexicon.sql
scripts.db:seed:sabre:local: npx wrangler d1 execute escribe-dev --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env=local --local --file db/lexicon-sabre-laser.sql
scripts.db:seed:sabre:dev: npx wrangler d1 execute escribe-dev --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env=dev --file db/lexicon-sabre-laser.sql
scripts.db:seed:sabre:prod: npx wrangler d1 execute escribe --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env="" --remote --file db/lexicon-sabre-laser.sql
scripts.db:seed:all:local: npm run db:seed:local && npm run db:seed:sabre:local
scripts.db:seed:all:dev: npm run db:seed:dev && npm run db:seed:sabre:dev
scripts.db:seed:all:prod: npm run db:seed:prod && npm run db:seed:sabre:prod
scripts.db:seed:all: npm run db:seed:all:local && npm run db:seed:all:dev && npm run db:seed:all:prod
scripts.db:import:combats:local: npm run db:import:combats && npx wrangler d1 execute escribe-dev --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env=local --local --file db/import-combats.sql
scripts.db:import:combats:dev: npm run db:import:combats && npx wrangler d1 execute escribe-dev --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env=dev --file db/import-combats.sql
scripts.db:import:combats:prod: npm run db:import:combats && npx wrangler d1 execute escribe --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env="" --remote --file db/import-combats.sql
scripts.db:migrate:local: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply escribe-dev --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env=local --local
scripts.db:migrate:dev: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply escribe-dev --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env=dev
scripts.db:migrate:prod: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply escribe --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env="" --remote
scripts.db:migrate:status:local: npx wrangler d1 migrations list escribe-dev --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env=local --local
scripts.db:migrate:status:dev: npx wrangler d1 migrations list escribe-dev --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env=dev
scripts.db:migrate:status:prod: npx wrangler d1 migrations list escribe --config backend/worker/wrangler.toml --env="" --remote
